attribute.description: action to pass to admin task. Default is add.

attribute.name: overwrite
attribute.description: overwrite flag passed to the admin task. Optional. Default is true

attribute.name: merge
attribute.description: merge flag passed to the admin task. Optional. Default is true

attribute.name: createIfNotExists
attribute.description: The createIfNotExists flag passed to the admin task. Optional. Default is true

attribute.name: force
attribute.description: force flag passed to the admin task. Optional. Default is false

attribute.name: failOnError
attribute.description: failOnError flag passed to the admin task. Optional. Default is true

attribute.name: objectSelector
attribute.description: The object selector to be used with the admin task. Optional. By default, the macrodef tries to construct the objectselector based on the other input attributes. If this is specified, most other attributes like envName etc will be ignored.
